isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - ENGINE FAN CONTROL - FAN OFF TEMPERATURE

svcproc.title: FAN OFF TEMPERATURE
svcproc.para: This parameter indicates the coolant temperature below which the fan will be electronically deactivated.

para.emph: ENGINE FAN CONTROL OCC SELF TEST FAILED

svcproc.para: Code 246 is set only during the Engine Off Standard test. During this test the ECM performs an output circuit test that momentarily enables the EFAN solenoid and measures the voltage drop across the solenoid. Refer to circuit diagram (Figure ).
